project.context.localization.common.db

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • project.context.localization.common.db.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    The DatabaseHelper provides a management class for the SQLite Database to store measurement information (bssi, ssid, rssi) and averages for WiFi access points at a specific place id.

      • addAverageRecords

        public long addAverageRecords(java.lang.String placeId,
                              java.lang.String bssi,
                              java.lang.String ssid,
                              double rssi)
        Inserts new records in average DB.
        Parameters:
        placeId - the place id
        bssi - the AP's bssi
        ssid - the AP's ssid
        rssi - the average rssi of the AP
        Returns:
        long of affected row id, returns -1 when failed.

      • addMeasurementsRecords

        public long addMeasurementsRecords(java.lang.String bssi,
                                   java.lang.String ssid,
                                   java.lang.Integer rssi,
                                   java.lang.String placeId)
        Insert new measurements record.
        Parameters:
        bssi - the new AP's bssi
        ssid - the new AP's ssid
        rssi - the new AP's scanned rssi
        placeId - the new AP's place id
        Returns:
        long of affected row id, returns -1 when failed.

      • getData

        public java.util.ArrayList<android.database.Cursor> getData(java.lang.String Query)
        This method is needed for the DBManager in the Mobile module. Also see Database Manager for Android on GitHub.
        Parameters:
        Query - interfacing argument for queries to be executed by DBManager.
        Returns:
        an array list of cursor to save two cursors one has results from the query.

        public android.database.Cursor getMeasurementsRssiAvgByBssiAndPlace()
        Gets measurements rssi average grouped by bssi and place Id.
        Returns:
        Cursor holding all measurements' placeId, BSSI, SSID and the average RSSI

      • getNumberOfDistinctMeasurementsByBssiForPlace

        public java.lang.String getNumberOfDistinctMeasurementsByBssiForPlace(java.lang.String place)
        Gets number of measurements with distinct bssis and total number of measurements for place.
        Parameters:
        place - the place id to filter the measurements table.
        Returns:
        String with the number of distinct measurements of bssis and total measurements for place
